Summary: Sighted pulsating yellow, red object. It flew siliently over our house perpendicular to the IAH westbound landing flight path
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting in our backyard at approximately 10:32 PM. We saw an object in the distance appear to ascend from close to the ground and climb to about 5000 -10000 feet. The object was a yellow and red sphere that pulsated and changed colors and shape between yellow and red. It flew over our house silently and crossed the George Bush IAH westbound landing flight path. It pulsated and slowly flickered until it disappeared. We are 7 miles from the IAH airport flight tower. They should have it on radar.
